backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing products with CRUD operations, search, sorting, and sample seeding using an in‑memory map and incremental IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented APK build and documentation features with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file providing prewritten summaries for multiple frontend source files.
frontend/artifacts/.gitkeep: Placeholder file ensuring the artifacts directory is tracked in Git.
frontend/docs/PLAY_STORE_TWA_GUIDE.md: Detailed guide explaining how to package and publish the PWA as a Trusted Web Activity for Google Play Store.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point including PWA meta tags, manifest links, icons, and root React mount point.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, shortcuts, and display behavior.
frontend/public/offline.html: Offline fallback HTML page shown when the user has no internet connectivity.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, cache cleanup, and a network‑first fetch strategy with offline fallback.
frontend/scripts/twa-build-aab-release.s: Builds a signed release AAB for a Bubblewrap TWA project, prompting for project directory and keystore details.
frontend/scripts/twa-build-apk-debug.sh: Builds a debug APK from a Bubblewrap TWA project and copies the output to an artifacts folder.
frontend/scripts/twa-build-apk-release.s: Builds a signed release APK for a Bubblewrap TWA project using a user‑provided keystore.
frontend/scripts/twa-init.sh: Initializes a Bubblewrap TWA project from a live manifest, validating prerequisites and prompting for package info.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main React router with routes for home, products, product details, and admin, and registers the service worker.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Dialog wrapper for creating or editing products, embedding the AdminProductForm.
Form for creating or updating products with validation, image handling, and mutations.
Admin table displaying products with edit, delete, and stock toggle actions.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image, pricing, stock status, and navigation to the product details page.
frontend/src/components/PwaInstallPrompt: Handles PWA install prompts, showing install UI when available and fallback instructions otherwise.
frontend/src/components/StoreFooter.tsx: Renders the store footer with branding, links, a promise statement, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/StoreHeader.tsx: Responsive store header with navigation, authentication-aware links, PWA prompt, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/StoreLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper including header, main content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/config/appConfig.ts: Centralized app deployment and metadata configuration including slug and branding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating product data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and basic global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin interface for viewing, creating, and editing products with authentication checks and dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage showing hero section, features, and featured product previews.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays detailed info for a single product with loading, error, and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Lists all products with search, sorting, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker and logs updates or registration failures.
frontend/src/utils/imageToDataUrl.ts: Converts an image File into a base64 data URL using FileReader.
frontend/src/utils/toUserMessage.ts: Transforms unknown errors into readable user-friendly messages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with dark mode, custom fonts, colors, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, feature statuses, and requirements for generating a downloadable Android APK and verifying required PWA icon assets.
